feature.title: Masterclass

whoCan.title: This masterclass is for
whoCan.para1: Software developers who are aiming to accelerate their respective careers by upskilling with Full stack development.
whoCan.para2: Professionals, irrespective of their domains, who have great enthusiasm to make a career transition into Full stack development.
whoCan.para3: learnbay Academy is an ed-tech company, founded by alumni of IIT Kharagpur.

eventDeatureData.paragraph1: The role of data science in banking has become increasingly important in recent years. Banks are always looking for ways to optimize their operations, and data scientists are the ones who help them do it.
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_1: In this webinar, we'll share the skills and knowledge you need to become a banking data science expert. We'll also cover the current job market and career advancement opportunities to help you take your career to new heights.
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_2: So, put on your data science cap and join us on this journey to become the King of Banking.
eventDeatureData.paragraph1_3: We can't wait to help you succeed!
eventDeatureData.paragraph2_2: who is hosting a FREE Masterclass on
eventDeatureData.paragraph3: Register today to reserve your spot.
eventDeatureData.paragraph24: Adoption & Application of AI, ML & Big Data in Banking
eventDeatureData.paragraph4: Integration of Business with Technology & its Benefits
eventDeatureData.paragraph5: Cost-Cutting using AI Fraud Detection & Automation using AI
eventDeatureData.paragraph5_1: Compliance Risks & Bias in AI for Banks
eventDeatureData.paragraph5_2: Market & Technology Trends Driving the Adoption of AI in Banking
eventDeatureData.paragraph5_3: ROI Measurement Criteria with AI in Banking
eventDeatureData.para3: What you will gain from this Masterclass
eventDeatureData.paragraph7: Remove fear of these difficult topics by learning via hands on session
eventDeatureData.paragraph8: Gain learning of how to approach coding problems
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_1: Solve various complex interview questions using the data structures
eventDeatureData.paragraph6_2: Banking professionals looking to upskill in data science in the banking domain
eventDeatureData.paragraph7_2: BFSI professionals who want to predict loan defaults and forecast insurance pricing
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_3: Executive-level BFSI professionals dreaming of securing a position at the forefront of BFSI
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_4: BFSI managers & leaders who want to incorporate data-driven practices into their business
eventDeatureData.paragraph8_5: Data scientists looking to make a meaningful impact in the banking domain
eventDeatureData.para7: What our Learners have to say
eventDeatureData.paragraph15: We are a leading provider of specialized courses in data science, data analytics, artificial intelligence and full-stack software development. We are dedicated to helping working professionals advance their careers and gain the technical expertise needed to succeed in the fast-paced world of technology.
eventDeatureData.paragraph16: Some of our standout features include:
eventDeatureData.paragraph17: Curriculum that is developed, supervised and approved by industry experts
eventDeatureData.paragraph18: 1:1 mentorship from top experts in the field
eventDeatureData.paragraph19: Opportunities to gain technical expertise through real-world projects
eventDeatureData.paragraph20: Over 250 hiring partners and dedicated placement support
eventDeatureData.paragraph22: Sign up for a free demo class and enroll in the domain of your choice.
